text: Eadward cingc gret Eadnoð biscop & Beorn eorl & alle mine þeignas on Hertfordscire freondlice.

& ic cyðe eow þæt ic habbe gegiuen Criste & Sancte Peter into Westmunstre þæt land æt Ældenham mid saca & mid socna, mid tolle & mid teame & infangeneþeofe swa full & swa forð swa Sihtric eorl of þan munstre þiowlice hit hyold & ætforen gewitnesse mid halra tunge Ælfrice þam abbot & þam gebroðran up betæhte & swa swa hit stod Ordbrihte abbot on hande into þam minstre beo Offie & be Cenwulfes cinges dagum & swa swa Ædgar cinge on his gewrite þider in hit gefestnode.
& ic nella nateswan geþafian þæt þar ænig mann ænine onstynge þær ofer habbe on ænige þingan oððer on ænige timan buton se abbot & þa munecas to Sancte Petres neode.
God eow gehealde, Sancte Petres holde.
